Name: G. G and G
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.
Review: Pine fresh gin notes combine with aniseed and herbal notes, freshened by pink grapefruit and toned by dashes of bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Ago Perrone at the Connaught Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of G. G and G contains 179 calories
